Items.Name: None
Items.Description: A godless realm

Items.Name: Eudivine
Items.Description: Reality altering gods exist in your setting (see divine in the APS document)

Items.Name: Pseudodivine
Items.Description: The universe or a cosmic force acts to cause the divine (see pseudodivine in the APS document)

Items.Name: Monoplane
Items.Description: No other planes of existance, just the material world.

Items.Name: Branching
Items.Description: Planes are seperated by their position on a branching hirachy (parralel timelines are usually in this category).

Items.Name: Frequency
Items.Description: Planes are seperated by their vibrational frequency and are thus arranged in single line.

Items.Name: Axial
Items.Description: Planes are seperated by their position on an extradimensional axis (so boyend x y z and w), there may be more than one axis.

Items.Name: Realspace
Items.Description: Space as we know it in our world.

Items.Name: Snowglobe
Items.Description: The world is all there is. There is no space.

Items.Name: True Fluidspace
Items.Description: The world is emersed in a fluid of some kind.

Items.Name: False Fluidspace
Items.Description: Some effect causes a fluid like environment.

Items.Name: None
Items.Description: Default

Items.Name: Psychics
Items.Description: Families of psychic powers (excluding divine).

Items.Name: Mental Channeling
Items.Description: Psychic systems that rely on focus to transmit energy directly via metabolic processes.

Items.Name: Ethereal
Items.Description: Psychic systems that rely on an ether to draw energy via metabolic processes.

Items.Name: Psyonics
Items.Description: Psychic systems that rely on focus to cause changes in the frequencies of various waves via metabolic processes.

Items.Name: Mental Conjuration
Items.Description: Psychic systems that rely on bringing matter into reality from an abstract realm via metabolic processes.

Items.Name: Magics
Items.Description: Families of magic (excluding pseudodivine).

Items.Name: Mana
Items.Description: Magic systems that rely on a mana pool to store energy.

Items.Name: Ethereal
Items.Description: Magic systems that rely on an ether to draw energy.

Items.Name: Internal Qi
Items.Description: Magic systems that rely on the life force within the body of the caster to store energy.

Items.Name: External Qi
Items.Description: Magic systems that rely on the life force of the environment to draw energy.
